body.name: FUNTOUCH Rechargeable Folding Vanity Mirror with 72 Led Lights, 3 Color Lighting, Dimmable Touch Screen for Travel, Cosmetics and Gifts
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 45 mins
features: 1.【Rechargeable CONTINUOUSLY WORK FOR 1.3HOURS】: The beauty Travel led Light up mirror is built-in 1000mAh rechargeable Lithium battery, continuously works for up to 1.3 hours after fully charged, no need to charge frequently any more, convenient for you to take for travelling. The portable light up mirror for makeup can be charged through USB by powerbank, PC, etc. Soft pads at the bottom makes the travel mirror stands stably by itself on countertop.

2.【3 Color Lights Portable Travel Makeup Mirror】 This lighted travel makeup mirror with 72 LEDs, offers white lights, warm lights and cool lights. Easily switch the color temp between a warm glow to white glow to see how exactly your makeup will look in various lighting situations like daytime, evening,and working environments. The led light is natural and soft, bright but not dazzling, can light the most dark and poorly lit areas, helping you achieve a flawless professional makeup.

3.【Travel Size Lighted Makeup Mirror】 This rechargeable travel mirror with lights is Ipad Mini Size.The slim, lightweight and compact design makes the Eclipse your new travel buddy. Whether you’re in a hotel, train, university or at home this mirror makes it easy for slipping into your overnight bag ready to take on whatever the new day brings.

4.【Brightness Adjustable via Smart Touch Sensor】This travel makeup mirror are controlled a high-sensitivity touch button. Tap the switch to turn ON/OFF and change the 3 color light modes. A long press of the switch can adjust the brightness.
5.【Simple and Easy to Carry 】- Compact and portable folding design, you can easily put the light up mirror into your handbag or luggage for perfect travel use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FUNTOUCH Rechargeable Portable Travel Lighted Makeup Mirror with Lights

Updated High-quality 72 led Lights This makeup mirror is built in 72 pcs of Bright, Bold and Illuminating Ring Light, which is natural and soft, bright but not dazzling, can light the most dark and poorly lit areas, helping you achieve a flawless professional makeup Dimmable Touch Screen Tap the sensor switch to turn ON/OFF and change 3 color light modes: white, warm, cool light. Hold the switch for a few seconds to adjust the brightness. Stepless dimming technology makes this lighted make up mirror much smarter than traditional ones. USB Charged This light up travel cosmetic makeup mirror has a rechargeable 1000mAh Lithium battery inside, charged through USB cable (included) by powerbank, PC, etc. This mirror can store power by itself, no need to charge frequently. Very convenient for you to take when travelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars oh. my. gosh. EXCEEDS expectations.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an LED mirror for travel because I have a cabin trip upcoming and desperately need something to do my makeup and hair. This is the best mirror I’ve bought from Amazon and this is probably the 4th LED mirror I’ve bought and my favorite within minutes. It’s bright, the mirror is fantastic and it’s nice and compact but can easily be used for everyday use. I am so so happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Travel Companion - Sleek and Handy!
reviews.reviewText: This compact rechargeable travel mirror has been a game-changer for me. Its sleek design fits easily into any bag or purse, making it ideal for travel. The mirror's lighting is bright and even, providing clear visibility in any setting. Its rechargeable feature adds convenience, eliminating the need for constant battery replacements. Surprisingly affordable, this mirror blends functionality with style seamlessly. A must-have for anyone on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel or work
reviews.reviewText: Perfect little mirror for traveling or keeping at work. Super quick charge. Love the light settings. Perfect size to put in a travel bag or even a purse. Thin, and lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very portable but charge dies fast
reviews.reviewText: For a quick, on-the-go mirror that takes up little space, this is the one to get. The brightness is more than satisfactory and there are different settings that are easier on your eyes while still supplying sufficient light.One of the things I didn't like about it, though, was the battery life. I find myself charging it 1-2 times a week as my girlfriend and I use it for our skincare routines as well as her makeup. The charging cable that it comes with was very short, so I use my own. I don't expect many people have a longer micro-usb cable on them these days, but if you do you shouldn't have much of a problem. Another thing I didn't like was that the mirror only angles about 45 degrees, which should be satisfactory for most but I like having the mirror relatively close to my face without having to crane my neck to the table its on.Despite these personal issues, I would say that for the general buyer this is a great mirror to get. It does what it needs to and I use it every single day. I don't plan on getting another anytime soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is perfect for traveling but was smaller than I expected. This is my fault. The size is visibly listed and it was us not paying attention. The light is bright and it was useful. Travel mirror is the exact size. It is made to fit in a small bag and could fit in a purse easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good for travel!
reviews.reviewText: The travel makeup LED mirror has been an absolute lifesaver for my on-the-go beauty routine! Its compact size and built-in LED lights make it the perfect companion for travel. I love how easily it fits into my bag or suitcase, and the LED lights provide fantastic illumination for precise makeup application, regardless of the lighting conditions in different places. The convenience of having a reliable and compact mirror with excellent lighting has truly elevated my travel makeup game. If you're someone who values flawless makeup application while traveling, this LED mirror is an absolute must-have—it's made my beauty routine so much easier and more efficient on the road!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel, But Short Lifespan
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is exactly what I needed for traveling, as any regular makeup wearer knows that lighting for doing your makeup is often disastrous in hotels/guest rooms/ect. It has three light hues, all of which are great for application. I enjoy it so much that I actually just ended up using it every day since I got it.The downside is that it doesn't always hold a charge long enough (timing being subjective of course, depending how long you take). I've been using it daily for a little over a year, and I've noticed that it dies quicker and quicker as time passes on. I take 20-30 mins to do my makeup and the last few months have had me charging it MULTIPLE times while I'm doing my makeup (after leaving it charging all night before). I don't have/can't afford a good set up for doing makeup, so I legitimately need this little well-lit mirror. It used to stay charged during my entire application, until it hit about 1 year of daily use. This week, it's started randomly turning on while it's charging, which is a sign that it's time to replace it and/or find something better.Overall good for quick applications and travel. Bad for spending quality time doing a full face, drinking coffee, messing around on your phone, and taking your time. You'll be racing against the clock using this and that's not how I like to spend my morning getting ready personally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is a great product. The light is very good and it packs for travel, very well.
Buena calidad. Tiene bastante luz, es portátil y viene con un estuche para protegerlo. Lo volvería a comprar

Compact but big enougj for travel. Great dimming option and the 3 different lights color are very practical! What i also like is that the mirror stand wont open alone, you really need to open it with a bit of force but that will prevent it from breaking or opening up in your bag/purse. I really love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein Geschenk für unterwegs für eine make-up artistin ... kommt das gut?
reviews.reviewText: Nun, wir waren auf der Suche nach einem Geschenk für eine make-up artistin. Sie hat selber eine top professionelle Ausstattung für ihr Geschäft. Aber wir wussten, dass ihr ein Schminkspiegel für privat (untewegs/Urlaub) fehlt.Wir sahen es natürlich als Risiko einem PRO so einen Artikel zu schenken... Lange Rede kurzer Sinn:Sie war begeistert vom Spiegel. Das Licht und Format sei super - ausreichend fürs Schminken z.B. im Hotelzimmer.Ziel erreicht. Daher von mir klar eine Empfehlung.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant productDifferent settings of brightnessHandy pouch to keep in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: It’s a great purchase value for money fully functional!
reviews.reviewText: I don’t usually do reviews but this item is fantastic, compact, good to look at, the fact that it is rechargeable makes a whole lot of difference, for this price you can’t go wrong and it has exceeded my expectations!Two light settings which are also dimmable! I can use this to do my make up in darkness,I can’t find anything wrong at the moment but this is excellent! Came super quick well packaged will put up a photo soon.
